15  // Lower_Distance_Matrix file format
16  Rips(const char* filename, int max_dim) : petls::Complex() { // call default constructor of parent class
17  std::vector<std::vector<std::tuple<int64_t,int64_t,int>>> boundaries_triples;
18  std::vector<std::vector<filtration_type>> filtrations;
19  float threshold = std::numeric_limits<value_t>::max();
20  rips_distance_matrix_file(filename, (long long int) max_dim, threshold, boundaries_triples, filtrations);
21  std::vector<SparseMatrixInt> boundaries(boundaries_triples.size());
22  boundaries_eigen(boundaries_triples, boundaries, filtrations);
23  this->set_boundaries_filtrations(boundaries, filtrations);
24 
25  }

39  // Eigen DenseMatrix with distances (correlations) in lower triangular part
40  Rips(DenseMatrix_PL distances, int max_dim) : petls::Complex() { // call default constructor of parent class
41  std::vector<std::vector<std::tuple<int64_t,int64_t,int>>> boundaries_triples;
42  std::vector<std::vector<filtration_type>> filtrations;
43  int num_rows = distances.rows();
44  std::vector<value_t> distances_vec;
45  distances_vec.reserve(num_rows*(num_rows-1)/2);
46  for (int i = 1; i < num_rows; i++){
47  for (int j = 0; j < i; j++){
48  distances_vec.push_back(distances(i,j));
49  }
50  }
51  compressed_lower_distance_matrix ripser_mat(std::move(distances_vec));
52 
53  basic_rips(ripser_mat,max_dim, std::numeric_limits<value_t>::infinity(), boundaries_triples, filtrations);
54 
55  std::vector<SparseMatrixInt> boundaries(boundaries_triples.size());
56  boundaries_eigen(boundaries_triples, boundaries, filtrations);
57 
58  this->set_boundaries_filtrations(boundaries, filtrations);
59  }
60 
61  // Eigen DenseMatrix with distances (correlations) in lower triangular part
62  Rips(DenseMatrix_PL distances, int max_dim, float threshold) : petls::Complex() { // call default constructor of parent class
63  std::vector<std::vector<std::tuple<int64_t,int64_t,int>>> boundaries_triples;
64  std::vector<std::vector<filtration_type>> filtrations;
65  int num_rows = distances.rows();
66  std::vector<value_t> distances_vec;
67  distances_vec.reserve(num_rows*(num_rows-1)/2);
68  for (int i = 1; i < num_rows; i++){
69  for (int j = 0; j < i; j++){
70  distances_vec.push_back(distances(i,j));
71  }
72  }
73  compressed_lower_distance_matrix ripser_mat(std::move(distances_vec));
74 
75  basic_rips(ripser_mat,max_dim, threshold, boundaries_triples, filtrations);
76 
77  std::vector<SparseMatrixInt> boundaries(boundaries_triples.size());
78  boundaries_eigen(boundaries_triples, boundaries, filtrations);
79 
80  this->set_boundaries_filtrations(boundaries, filtrations);

109  // These static methods are to unambiguously wrap with Pybind11
110  // NumPy arrays can get converted to Eigen::Matrix or std::vector<std::vector< >>
111  static Rips from_distances(DenseMatrix_PL distances, int max_dim){
112  return Rips(distances, max_dim);

127  private:
128  void boundaries_eigen(std::vector<std::vector<std::tuple<int64_t,int64_t,int>>> &boundaries_triples, std::vector<SparseMatrixInt> &boundaries, std::vector<std::vector<value_t>>& filtrations){
129  for (int i = 0; i < (int) boundaries_triples.size(); i++){
130 
131  int dim = i + 1;
132  std::vector<Eigen::Triplet<int>> tripletList;
133  std::vector<std::tuple<int64_t, int64_t, int>> boundary_triples = boundaries_triples[i]; // is this an unnecessary copy?
134  // convert to eigen triple format and use the mapping
135  for (int j = 0; j < (int) boundary_triples.size(); j++){
136  int row = std::get<0>(boundary_triples[j]);
137  int col = std::get<1>(boundary_triples[j]);
138  int coeff = std::get<2>(boundary_triples[j]);
139  tripletList.push_back(Eigen::Triplet<int>(row, col, coeff));
140  }
141  SparseMatrixInt boundary(filtrations[dim-1].size(), filtrations[dim].size());
142 
143  boundary.setFromTriplets(tripletList.begin(), tripletList.end());
144  boundaries[i]=boundary;
145  }
146  }
147  };
148 }
